entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
